title: 7 Colors for Quick Release Leather Watch Band, Fullmosa Bamboo Genuine Leather Replacement Watch Strap with Stainless Metal Clasp 18mm 20mm 22mm 24mm
feature: 22mm Watch Band: use with any traditional or smart watch that uses 22mm spring bars. Quick release spring bars are included with and integrated into the band. So it is important that your watch’s lug width matches the band width – 22mm. Otherwise, the 22mm band does not fit your watch properly. Measure the width where the band meets the watch casing before ordering.If you are looking for more styles and colors, please search: B07CTFPMHX B07D32M8QJ B07F27H2KN.

SMART WATCH WIDTHS: the following picture part has listed the proper width for most popular smart watches use 22mm spring bars - Asus ZenWatch 2 1.63" WI501Q; Basis Peak Fitness Tracker Watch; Cookoo Smart Watch; Casio MDV106;Huawei Watch 2 Classic; LG G Watch W100, Moto 360 2 (2nd Gen, 46mm 2015); Martian Notifier Smart Watch; Pebble Time/Pebble Time Steel/Pebble Classic; Samsung Gear 2 R380, Neo R381, Live R382; Samsung Gear S3 Classic and Frontier.

Sizing: Designed to fit almost any wrist. The 22mm watch bands are 3.15" x 4.72" (7.87" total length).11 (22mm) precision cut eyelets allow for individualized adjustment to achieve the perfect fit. Two cross-stitched collars allow the ban to be secured. Refined, Durable, and Comfortable all in one.

EASY Installation: Fullmosa Quick Release design makes it fast and simple to install and change your band in seconds. While most people can do this with just their finger we also include an assistant tool to meet your needs.

Superior Quality: 100% Genuine Full Grain Leather replacement straps. RoHS certified to contain zero harmful or toxic substances. For more product options, please visit our store by clicking the blue Fullmosa logo above the product title. Please ensure you choose "Sold by Fullmosa" for guaranteed quality. If you have any problems with your order please contact us for prompt and courteous service.
